item.title: Commands
item.description: Syntax Pattern Description <argument-name> Required argument, replace with appropriate value. [argument-name] Optional argument, replace with appropriate value. argument-name Enter this literally, as shown. /js command Arguments /js <javascript code> Permission hephaestus.commands.js Runs raw javascript code.
